Referrals¶

There are 3 main pieces to referrals when OTIS is not an option:

  • Organization referrals

  • Legal information

  • Forms

How these appear and are tagged depend on a variety of factors.

User seeking legal information and/or forms¶

User seeking a lawyer and legal information or forms¶

Algorithms in use:

  • Legal forms and information
    • How content referrals are selected
  • Organization referrals
